content: @Matteo Capucci (he/him) has gotten the archive for zulip conversations up and running! That means that if you have a conversation here that advances your research, you can actually cite it in a reliable way. As for what such a citation should look like... that's still undecided!
Exactly as we do for arXiv. Pre-print type should be, instead of arXiv, CT Zulip or something like that. :smile:
